body_html:
I also have a problem with 0.8.0 nightly (on the other hand, 0.7.1 stable works well) Following @pulkitag, I tried to uninstall the packages and then reinstall them; but segmentation fault still occurs.

When I install numpy (1.11) and tensorflow (0.8.0) only, segfault did not occur. However, just after installing scikit-learn (0.17.1), segfault started to occur. I am not sure why this happens, but we might need to inspect this situation as well.

UPD: I found that this is under discussion in #2034.

UPD: I found that this is under discussion in #2034.
body:
I also have a problem with 0.8.0 nightly (on the other hand, 0.7.1 stable works well) Following @pulkitag, I tried to uninstall the packages and then reinstall them; but segmentation fault still occurs.

When I install numpy (1.11) and tensorflow (0.8.0) only, segfault did not occur. However, just after installing `scikit-learn` (0.17.1), segfault started to occur. I am not sure why this happens, but we might need to inspect this situation as well.

UPD: I found that this is under discussion in #2034.
